title: How to test REST Services with RestAssured
content: In this tutorial, we will be discussing REST Assured framework to Test JAX-RS Web services. This tutorial is designed for RESTAssured beginners, but even experienced users may find some useful tips and tricks. RestAssured is a Java library that provides a domain-specific language (DSL) for writing powerful, maintainable tests for RESTful APIs. It allows you ...  The post appeared first on .
